name: Wikimove
description: FLOW is a cross-regional, city-centric platform to manage the shift towards Mobility as a Service by leveraging data and orchestrating public and private mobility services in concert to the streets and infrastructure on which they rely.
one_liner: FLOW is a cross-regional, city-centric platform to manage the shift towards Mobility as a Service by leveraging data and orchestrating public and private mobility services in concert to the streets and infrastructure on which they rely.
industry: Lifestyles of Health and Sustainability and wellness
